name: Lackeys' Lack of Luck
description:
In this RPG, you and your friends take on the roles of incapable henchmen. Your supervillain leader is dead (because you accidently killed them) and it's up to you to carry on.

Your superhero nemesis is on their way... Will you fight to survive or unintentionally kill each other due to your unlucky natures before they arrive?

Overcome your certain doom using gadgets, traps, and your wits! Experience catastrophic mayhem in Lackeys’ Lack of Luck!

Playtime: 1-3 hours

Players: 2-5 players and a Game Master

Supplies: 5 d6 for each person
